mapper.update: update WM.SYS_ROLE set ROLECODE = #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLENAME = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_SYS_ROLE = #{pkSysRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_SYS_ROLE, ROLECODE, ROLENAME, CREATEUSER, DR, TS, REMARK from WM.SYS_ROLE

select A.PK_SYS_ROLE, A.ROLECODE, A.ROLENAME, A.CREATEUSER, A.DR, A.TS, A.REMARK from FROM SYS_ROLE A LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE B ON A.PK_SYS_ROLE=B.PK_SYS_ROLE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER C ON B.PK_SYS_USER=C.PK_SYS_USER WHERE NVL(A.DR,0)=0 AND NVL(C.DR,0)=0 C.PK_SYS_USER=#{pkSysUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
